Package frc.alotobots.library.driverstation

Class JoystickUtilities

java.lang.Object
frc.alotobots.library.driverstation.JoystickUtilities
public class JoystickUtilities extends Object
Utility class providing methods for processing joystick inputs. Includes functions for deadband processing, scaling, and various input transformations commonly used in robot control systems.

  • Constructor Details

    • JoystickUtilities

      public JoystickUtilities()

  • Method Details

    • joyDeadBnd

      public static double joyDeadBnd(double rawJoy, double deadband)
      Applies a deadband to a joystick input value and rescales the remaining range. Values within the deadband range are set to zero, while values outside are rescaled to maintain smooth control transitions.
      Parameters:
      rawJoy - The raw joystick input value (-1.0 to 1.0)
      deadband - The deadband range (0.0 to 1.0)
      Returns:
      The processed joystick value with deadband applied

    • joySqrd

      public static double joySqrd(double rawJoy)
      Squares the joystick input while preserving the sign. This provides finer control at low speeds while maintaining full power availability.
      Parameters:
      rawJoy - The raw joystick input value (-1.0 to 1.0)
      Returns:
      The squared joystick value, maintaining original sign

    • joyScaled

      public static double joyScaled(double rawJoy, double scalefactor)
      Scales a joystick input by a constant factor. Useful for limiting maximum speed or adjusting sensitivity.
      Parameters:
      rawJoy - The raw joystick input value (-1.0 to 1.0)
      scalefactor - The scaling factor to apply
      Returns:
      The scaled joystick value

    • joyDeadBndSqrd

      public static double joyDeadBndSqrd(double rawJoy, double deadband)
      Applies both deadband and squaring transformations to a joystick input. Combines deadband filtering with squared response for enhanced control.
      Parameters:
      rawJoy - The raw joystick input value (-1.0 to 1.0)
      deadband - The deadband range (0.0 to 1.0)
      Returns:
      The processed joystick value with deadband and squaring applied

    • joyDeadBndScaled

      public static double joyDeadBndScaled(double rawJoy, double deadband, double scalefactor)
      Applies deadband and scaling transformations to a joystick input. First applies deadband, then scales the result.
      Parameters:
      rawJoy - The raw joystick input value (-1.0 to 1.0)
      deadband - The deadband range (0.0 to 1.0)
      scalefactor - The scaling factor to apply after deadband
      Returns:
      The processed joystick value with deadband and scaling applied

    • joyDeadBndSqrdScaled

      public static double joyDeadBndSqrdScaled(double rawJoy, double deadband, double scalefactor)
      Applies deadband, squaring, and scaling transformations to a joystick input. Processes input in order: deadband → squaring → scaling.
      Parameters:
      rawJoy - The raw joystick input value (-1.0 to 1.0)
      deadband - The deadband range (0.0 to 1.0)
      scalefactor - The scaling factor to apply after deadband and squaring
      Returns:
      The fully processed joystick value
